MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH26 postcode area of Penicuik. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far we located faulty electrical equipment on our underground cable network on Carlops Road and we now expect your supply to be restored by 10AM. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.09AM on 14th October 2020.
